Summary: Small, diamond shaped object following Rt. 30 bypass,Thorndale PA.
trends: There have been no other sightings in East Fallowfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving east on the route 30 bypass i noticed in the distance what i though was a helicopter. it appeared to be following the highway going straight and level, east to west. from that distance, it appeared to be cigar shaped and without wings. as it got closer, and at an altitude of approx. 200-300 ft, i noticed that it was diamond shaped, rather thick, and silent. there's a 50\50 chance it was a helium filled balloon someone let go, but several factors add doubt to that possibility. 1. it traveled east to west against the prevailing wind at a steady pace. 2. it did not continue to rise as a balloon filled with helium might. 3. it followed the route of the highway precisely. i'd be interested to see if anyone else observed this, even if it proves to be a balloon. i lost sight of it as it passed overhead.
